name: StepExercise
description:
A game that exercises like a step lift on the touch panel.
Compete how many sets can be done in 30 seconds.

1. First, tap the start position with two fingers.
2. Release your finger tapping on the bottom left and tap on the top left.
3. Release the finger tapping on the bottom right and tap on the top right.
4. Release the finger tapping on the top left and tap on the bottom left.
5. Release the finger tapping on the top right and tap on the bottom right.
One set is the above procedure.

Repeat the above procedure until the time limit.

*** Be careful not to break the device, by exciting too much.
